.. include:: headings.inc


.. _stock items:
.. _stock id list:

===============================================
|phoenix_title|  **Stock items**
===============================================

The following is the list of the window IDs for which stock buttons
and menu items are created.

See the :ref:`wx.Button` constructor and the :ref:`wx.MenuItem`
constructor for classes which automatically add stock bitmaps when
using stock IDs. Also note that you can retrieve stock bitmaps
using :ref:`wx.ArtProvider`.


+-------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------+--------------------------+
| Stock ID                      | GTK Icon                                                             | Stock label              |
+===============================+======================================================================+==========================+
| ``wx.ID_ABOUT``               | .. figure:: _static/images/stock/gtk-about.png                       | &About...                |
|                               |    :align: left                                                      |                          |
+-------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------+--------------------------+
| ``wx.ID_ADD``                 | .. figure:: _static/images/stock/gtk-add.png                         | Add                      |
|                               |    :align: left                                                      |                          |
+-------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------+--------------------------+
| ``wx.ID_APPLY``               | .. figure:: _static/images/stock/gtk-apply.png                       | &Apply                   |
|                               |    :align: left                                                      |                          |
+-------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------+--------------------------+
| ``wx.ID_BACKWARD``            | .. figure:: _static/images/stock/gtk-go-back-ltr.png                 | &Back                    |
|                               |    :align: left                                                      |                          |
+-------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------+--------------------------+
| ``wx.ID_BOLD``                | .. figure:: _static/images/stock/gtk-bold.png                        | &Bold                    |
|                               |    :align: left                                                      |                          |
+-------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------+--------------------------+
| ``wx.ID_BOTTOM``              | .. figure:: _static/images/stock/gtk-goto-bottom.png                 | &Bottom                  |
|                               |    :align: left                                                      |                          |
+-------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------+--------------------------+
| ``wx.ID_CANCEL``              | .. figure:: _static/images/stock/gtk-cancel.png                      | &Cancel                  |
|                               |    :align: left                                                      |                          |

| ``wx.ID_CDROM``               | .. figure:: _static/images/stock/gtk-cdrom.png                       | &CD-Rom                  |
|                               |    :align: left                                                      |                          |
+-------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------+--------------------------+
| ``wx.ID_CLEAR``               | .. figure:: _static/images/stock/gtk-clear.png                       | &Clear                   |
|                               |    :align: left                                                      |                          |

|                               |    :align: left                                                      |                          |
+-------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------+--------------------------+

|                               |    :align: left                                                      |                          |

.. note:: Note that some of the IDs listed above also have a stock accelerator and an associated help string.
